resources:
Scouting App 2026 SETTINGS PRE-MATCH SETUP STARTING POSITION CLEAR THIS SCREEN? EXIT POSSESSION SCORING ROBOT CONTROL PANEL CLIMB POST-MATCH DID YOU SCAN YOUR QR CODE?
Setup Auton Teleop Post-Match
SCOUTER NAME: MATCH #: TEAM #: ALLIANCE PARTNERS: ALLIANCE COLOR:
Complete the fields below before the start of each match. Press START when you hear the charge sound! Tap on the field diagram below to mark the robotâ€™s starting position.
BLUE RED No robot on field CLEAR START GENERATE QR CODE
FOR STRATEGY COMMITTEE MEMBERS ONLY
RESET APP BACK QR Code Cache
If a QR code fails to generate or the app is displaying persistent and incorrect active states, tap the button below.
RESET ALL VARIABLES Team Number: %1$s Match Number: %2$s
000 Exit DONE CANCEL Save
Are you sure that you want to leave? All data will be lost!
AUTON SECONDS REMAINING Tap the +/- buttons to increase or decrease the counter for each option. REEF ALGAE REEF DEALGAEFYING PROCESSOR NET PICKED UP DROPPED + - Tap the + or - buttons to record scored/missed notes. SCORED MISSED= REMOVED ATTEMPTED L4 L3 L2 L1 Turn the toggle on if the action happens. Leave (Robot left the starting zone) Fell Over Teleop is starting soon... Switch to teleop as soon as possible! NEXT: TELEOP
Played Defense Fell over/Died NEXT: POST-MATCH
Do not complete this screen until >5 seconds after the buzzer BARGE ZONE What position is the cage in? Park Hang DEEP SHALLOW RIGHT TRAP SCORING Tap the + and - buttons to record scored/missed notes.
Please Wait…\nGenerating QR Code…
GENERATE QR CODE? Are you sure you want to generate a QR code? Once you generate a code you cannot return to the match to make changes.
Here is your QR Code: QR Code Are you sure you want to generate a QR code? Once you generate a code you cannot return to the match to make changes. Returning to the Setup screen will erase this QR code and all of your data from this match.
DID YOU SCAN YOUR QR CODE? Returning to the Setup screen will erase this QR code and all of your data from this match. SET UP NEXT MATCH
OUTER INNER
HIGH\n(OUTER/INNER) LOWER
Are you sure you want to clear all data on the setup screen?
PASSWORD Please enter a password to access the Settings screen PASSWORD SETTINGS Password protect app settings?
DIVE Into the Next Match Scanned? SET UP NEXT MATCH Tap on the toggle to record if the options are true (on) or false (off). Preloaded Fuel FUEL AMP
